name: Jaime Boixadós Martínez

experiences.title: Python Engineer
experiences.description: Python developer at the SNCF. Working in a project for helping the SNCF anticipate and to plan future construction and maintenance works in all the French railway network.

experiences.title: Python Engineer
experiences.description: Python developer at Amadeus in the project Traveler ID. Traveler ID digitalizes identity and health document verifications at every stage of the traveler journey. It provides to airlines, airports, hotels, travel agencies and other travel partners the means to perform automatic identification and COVID-19 document verification at any travel checkpoint such as check-in, boarding, airport security etc (source amadeus.com).

experiences.title: Python Engineer
experiences.description: Python developer at SNCF. The projects revolved around developing multiple APIs for internal use at SNCF.

experiences.title: Python Engineer
experiences.description: Python developer at Groupama, working in projects oriented around OCR and similar machine learning subjects.

experiences.title: Big Data Engineer
experiences.description: Schneider Electric: Working on different projects, all of them using AWS.

experiences.title: Intern - Data Scientist
experiences.description: During my time at Sofiasquare I worked on a project of user scoring. The objective was to show the best potential teachers for a particular student.

education.title: Master in Data Science, Data Science
education.description:
• 2017-2018 Université Nice Sophia Antipolis
• 2016-2017 Universidad Politecnica de Madrid

about: Young software engineer/data engineer. I am a passionate of new technologies, hackathons and any other kind of coding contest (BattleDev, Condingame...). I like to do rock climbing, work on my home automation and personal projects during my free time. This CV is one of them! You can change multiple aspects of it by playing with the options available in the left menu. That way you can create a CV that fits your needs and preferences!
